title: Bad Blonde (1953) Xvid 1cd - Film Noir -  Barbara Peyton, Tony W
description:
Bad Blonde (1953) Xvid 1cd - Film Noir -  Barbara Peyton, Tony Wright [DDR]

The Flanagan Boy (released in the United States as Bad Blonde) is a 1953 British film noir directed by Reginald Le Borg. 
It was made by Hammer Film Productions and stars Barbara Payton, Tony Wright, Frederick Valk and Sid James. 
The Flanagan Boy was based on the novel of the same name by Max Catto.

    CAST:-
    Barbara Payton as Lorna Vecchi
    Frederick Valk as Giuseppe Vecchi
    John Slater as Charlie Sullivan
    Sid James as Sharkey
    Tony Wright as Johnny Flanagan
    Marie Burke as Mother Vecchi
    Selma Vaz Dias as Mrs. Corelli, Vecchi's sister
    Enzo Coticchia as Mr. Corelli

Directed by Reginald Le Borg
Produced by Anthony Hinds
Screenplay by Guy Elmes
Music by Ivor Slaney
Running time 79 minutes

SYNOPSIS:- Bad Blonde aka The Flanagan Boys (1962)
A shady promoter (James) spots a young boxer (Wright) and takes him under his wing, in an attempt to launch a comeback into prizefighting. He secures the backing of a wealthy Italian (Valk), but problems start to arise when the fighter becomes romantically involved with the millionaire's wife (Payton).
A scheming blonde seduces a fighter and convinces him to murder her husband, a fight manager.
